Events¶

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.confirm_room_ownership_transfer(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.ConfirmRoomOwnershipTransferRequest, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Handles the confirmation of the ownership transfer of a room.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.ConfirmRoomOwnershipTransferRequest

Response (emitted to the room): role_updated event

Data: fliji_sockets.models.user_service_api.ConfirmRoomOwnershipTransferResponse

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.current_duration(sid, data: CurrentDurationRequest)¶

Broadcasts the current duration of the video in a room.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.RoomActionRequest

Response (emitted to everybody in the room except for the sender): current_duration event

Data:

{
    "duration": 15,
    "is_played": true
}
async fliji_sockets.sio_main.disconnect(sid, db: ~pymongo.database.Database = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'}, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Not meant to be called manually.

This event is automatically called when a socket disconnects. Handles both manual disconnection and automatic disconnection due to network issues.

Deletes the user’s video view session and online user status. Also saves the video view session to the db if it was not saved before.

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.end_video_watch_session(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.EndVideoWatchSessionRequest, db: ~pymongo.database.Database = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'}, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Handles the end of a video watch session.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.EndVideoWatchSessionRequest

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.get_sessions_for_video(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.GetViewSessionsForVideoRequest, db: ~pymongo.database.Database = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Handles the request for the view sessions for a video.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.GetViewSessionsForVideoRequest

Response (emitted to the client): current_video_view_sessions event

[
  {
    "user_uuid": "a3f4c5d6-7e8f-9g0h-1i2j-3k4l5m6n7o8p",
    "current_watch_time": 15,
    "last_update_time": "2021-08-01T12:00:00",
    "avatar": "https://example.com/avatar.png",
    "username": "username",
    "first_name": "first_name",
    "last_name": "last_name"
  }
]

Where:

current_watch_time is in seconds

last_update_time is an ISO formatted string

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.handle_right_to_speak(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.HandleRightToSpeakRequest, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Handles the handling of the right to speak request in a room. Only the admin of the room can handle the right to speak request.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.HandleRightToSpeakRequest

Response (emitted to the room): right_to_speak_updated event

Data: fliji_sockets.models.user_service_api.HandleRightToSpeakResponse

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.join_room(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.JoinRoomRequest, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.JoinRoomRequest

Response (emitted to everybody in the room except for the sender): new_user event

    "uuid": "a3f4c5d6-7e8f-9g0h-1i2j-3k4l5m6n7o8p",
    "status": "online",
    "mic": true,
    "role": "owner"
}

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.startup(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.OnConnectRequest, db: ~pymongo.database.Database = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'}, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

This event should be called when a socket connects. It validates the user’s auth token and stores the user’s UUID in the session.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.OnConnectRequest

Raises:

FatalError – If the user’s auth token is invalid or the user’s UUID cannot be found.

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.toggle_user_mic(sid, data: ~fliji_sockets.models.socket.ToggleVoiceUserMicRequest, api_service: ~fliji_sockets.api_client.FlijiApiService = {'callable': <function Depends.<locals>.async_dependency_wrapper>, 'type': 'dependency'})¶

Toggles the mic of a user in a room. Only the admin of the room can toggle the mic of other users.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.ToggleVoiceUserMicRequest

Response (emitted to everybody in the room): mic_user event

Data: fliji_sockets.models.user_service_api.ToggleVoiceUserMicResponse

async fliji_sockets.sio_main.video_pause(sid, data: RoomActionRequest)¶

Handles the pausing of a video in a room.

The client should validate that the event is only emitted by the admin of the room.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.RoomActionRequest

Response (emitted to everybody the room): video_pause event

data

{
    "from_uuid": "a3f4c5d6-7e8f-9g0h-1i2j-3k4l5m6n7o8p"
}
async fliji_sockets.sio_main.video_play(sid, data: RoomActionRequest)¶

Handles the playing of a video in a room.

The client should validate that the event is only emitted by the admin of the room.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.RoomActionRequest

Response (emitted to everybody in the room): video_play event

data

{
    "from_uuid": "a3f4c5d6-7e8f-9g0h-1i2j-3k4l5m6n7o8p"
}
async fliji_sockets.sio_main.video_timecode(sid, data: VideoTimecodeRequest)¶

Broadcasts the current timecode of the video in a room.

The client should validate that the event is only emitted by the admin of the room.

Request: fliji_sockets.models.socket.RoomActionRequest

Response (emitted to everybody in the room except for the sender): video_timecode event

Data:

{
    "timecode": 15,
    "from_uuid": "a3f4c5d6-7e8f-9g0h-1i2j-3k4l5m6n7o8p"
}
